review: I like it. You need good wifi for it to work properly but other than that its great!
author: Ariel

review: Works well. My only caveat would be to make sure the content you want to be able to "cast" to your TV is supported. You cannot "cast" everything you might be able to access on your phone, or tablet.
author: Jeff Yunker

review: Works great! I rarely watch regular television anymore.
author: Scott Hudson

review: Although not as feature rich as it's competitors primarily where storage is concerned; the biggest let down here is the absence of a remote other than that great product at a great price. There are some latency issues at times mostly when using a mobile device and when casting your entire desktop but despite the bugs still a great buy for the price. Definitely not disappointed.
author: Myron James

review: Works like a charm. Perfect for me since I like to watch Netflix in my room. Can just watch from my TV now instead of my phone.
author: William Roberts

review: It's okay - not perfect - but quite good.  I like it for streaming Netflix onto my tv.
author: Willoughby

review: Lots of fun on the internet
author: Lois

review: Don't  work  i wish  never buying
author: estuardobarrera
